item.title: Star Trek Picard: Review
item.description: Old man seeks revenge for the death of cute young girl. Old man finds out that cute young girl is robot. Old man kills dozens of innocent people to save robot. Great.
item.content: Old man seeks revenge for the death of cute young girl. Old man finds out that cute young girl is robot. Old man kills dozens of innocent people to save robot. Great.
